query:
UPDATE warehouseLocations 
SET status = CASE 
  WHEN EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM inventory 
    WHERE inventory.locationId = warehouseLocations.id 
    AND inventory.quantity > 0
  ) THEN 'occupied'
  ELSE 'available'
END
WHERE status IN ('available', 'occupied');
